casebody.data:
No.-

First Circuit COMEAUX, ET ALS., v. BROUSSARD (February 15, 1928. Opinion and Decree.) (See Broussard vs. Broussard, on page .635.) Kennedy and Dugas, of Lafayette, attorneys for plaintiff, appellant. DeBaillon and Meaux, of Lafayette, attorneys for defendant, appellee. MOUTON, J.

In this case for the reasons assigned in the case of Andre Broussard vs. same defendant, and consolidated herewith for trial, it is ordered adjudged and decreed that the judgment appealed from be affirmed with costs.
